name: Wizard Joe's Magically Magical Machine Repair Service (Ryan Kline)
name_original: Wizard Joe's Magically Magical Machine Repair Service (Ryan Kline)
description:
NOTE: This game is a little rough around the edges so you have to reboot the game after every play session. :/ Sometimes game jams be like that.

Wizard Joe's uses the latest in advanced fairy magic to repair people's magically magical magic generating machines.

Two rival wizards from different branches are called to the same repair job, and stuff is about to go down. 

Become the top magical repair specialist in this breakout inspired 2 player action rouge-like battle royale. (2 Xbox controllers required). 

Hint: Press the select/back button (or Game Menu Toggle button on Xbox One controller) to change your wizard's color.
